price: 22. Dan sekiranya orang-orang yang kafir itu memerangi kamu, pastilah mereka akan berbalik melarikan diri (kalah), dan mereka tidak akan mendapatkan pelindung dan penolong.
arabic: وَلَوۡ قَٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوَلَّوُاْ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw qātalakumu alladhīna kafarū lawallawū al-adbāra thumma lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
